snippet: Raymond James Financial has agreed to buy Morgan Keegan for $930 million in cash, creating one of the biggest regional brokerage firms in the country.
abstract: Raymond James Financial has agreed to buy Morgan Keegan for $930 million in cash, creating one of the biggest regional brokerage firms in the country.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Raymond James to Buy Morgan Keegan
